query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

result.title: Report on improving excellence in multi-objective optimisation
result.description: The reports on improving excellence in multi-objective optimisation describes the improvements with respect to the integration of USTL and CUAS expertise to improve the expertise of all partners involved. It will focus on the actions taken to merge large scale parallel optimisation algorithms and high quality surrogate models as well as the steps to make JSI a leading authority in the field(s).

result.title: Project video
result.description: Related to Task 62INNEN will produce a project video with high quality to promote the project explaining the need for this project and to separate equipmenthigh value sources the wider European and international scope and promoting the projects results The video will be released on the projects website after its launch on the Task 63 clustering event but also through other social media if effective for our projects purpose of creating more outreach

result.title: Dissemination kit, 1st version
result.description: This is the 1st version of the report in a series of 3 versionsRelated to Task 61The dissemination kit will include the tools with the right level of project public information for all partners to be used when attending events More specific the kit will include items such as the project logo project public presentations a 2pager brochureflyer and multimedia material which will be presented and distributed on each occasion Templates for presentations deliverables and reports will be updated when necessary
